org.apache.cordova

类 CoreAndroid

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cordova.CordovaPlugin
      • org.apache.cordova.CoreAndroid

  • public class CoreAndroid
extends CordovaPlugin
    This class exposes methods in Cordova that can be called from JavaScript.

    • 方法详细资料

      • fireJavascriptEvent

        public void fireJavascriptEvent(java.lang.String action)
        Send an event to be fired on the Javascript side.
        参数:
        action - The name of the event to be fired

      • pluginInitialize

        public void pluginInitialize()
        Sets the context of the Command. This can then be used to do things like get file paths associated with the Activity.
        覆盖:
        pluginInitialize 在类中 CordovaPlugin

      • execute

        public boolean execute(java.lang.String action,
                       org.json.JSONArray args,
                       CallbackContext callbackContext)
                throws org.json.JSONException
        Executes the request and returns PluginResult.
        覆盖:
        execute 在类中 CordovaPlugin
        参数:
        action - The action to execute.
        args - JSONArry of arguments for the plugin.
        callbackContext - The callback context from which we were invoked.
        返回:
        A PluginResult object with a status and message.
        抛出:
        org.json.JSONException

      • clearCache

        public void clearCache()
        Clear the resource cache.

      • loadUrl

        public void loadUrl(java.lang.String url,
                    org.json.JSONObject props)
             throws org.json.JSONException
        Load the url into the webview.
        参数:
        url -
        props - Properties that can be passed in to the Cordova activity (i.e. loadingDialog, wait, ...)
        抛出:
        org.json.JSONException

      • clearHistory

        public void clearHistory()
        Clear page history for the app.

      • backHistory

        public void backHistory()
        Go to previous page displayed. This is the same as pressing the backbutton on Android device.

      • overrideBackbutton

        public void overrideBackbutton(boolean override)
        Override the default behavior of the Android back button. If overridden, when the back button is pressed, the "backKeyDown" JavaScript event will be fired.
        参数:
        override - T=override, F=cancel override

      • overrideButton

        public void overrideButton(java.lang.String button,
                           boolean override)
        Override the default behavior of the Android volume buttons. If overridden, when the volume button is pressed, the "volume[up|down]button" JavaScript event will be fired.
        参数:
        button - volumeup, volumedown
        override - T=override, F=cancel override

      • isBackbuttonOverridden

        public boolean isBackbuttonOverridden()
        Return whether the Android back button is overridden by the user.
        返回:
        boolean

      • exitApp

        public void exitApp()
        Exit the Android application.

      • onDestroy

        public void onDestroy()
        从类复制的说明: CordovaPlugin
        The final call you receive before your activity is destroyed.
        覆盖:
        onDestroy 在类中 CordovaPlugin

      • sendResumeEvent

        public void sendResumeEvent(PluginResult resumeEvent)
        Used to send the resume event in the case that the Activity is destroyed by the OS
        参数:
        resumeEvent - PluginResult containing the payload for the resume event to be fired

        public static java.lang.Object getBuildConfigValue(android.content.Context ctx,
